$dispatcher_pool_size_desc.zh: 扇出工作进程的进程池大小。默认值 0 表示与系统可用调度器数量一样。增大进程池可以增加消息扇出的并发量。
$dispatcher_pool_size_desc.en: The size of fanout worker process pool. The default value 0 means to use the number of Erlang schedulers. Greater number means it can perform more fanout work concurrently.

$data_retention_desc.en: The retention period of fanout data. The default value is 7d.

$gc_interval_desc.en: The interval between garbage collection runs. The default value is 1h.
